chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)
Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st or 2nd Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Thomas James Anderson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Jail credit of 1 day if revoked.

If Probation or Extended Supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

miscConds.notes: plus 10% restitution surcharge.  Pay restitution for victim counseling and family counseling costs.          Amended 7/26/18: Per order dated 7/25/18 Restitution is now $0.
No contact with children under the age of 18 without agent's approval.  Agent to evaluate circumstances with son.  Not to consume, use or possess any alcohol or illegal drugs.
Participate and successfully complete a sex offender evaluation, assessment, counseling and follow through with recommendations.  Submit DNA sample.  Register with Sex Offender Registry Program.
AODA and follow through with recommendations.

timeConds.notes: Huber privileges granted after the first 30 days are served.
